summary: The module contains a suite of unit tests that exercise EC2 internet gateway operations using a mocked AWS environment. It validates creation, tagging, attachment to VPCs, detachment, deletion, description, and filtering of internet gateways, as well as handling of invalid inputs and error scenarios.
business_intent: To ensure that automated workflows for managing AWS EC2 internet gateways function correctly and robustly, supporting reliable cloud network configuration and compliance.
